Senior Kinch Ranks FAQ

Back to the Senior Kinch Ranks

Kinch Ranks is a system designed to measure competitors' overall performance across all official WCA events. The details of how the ranks are calculated can be found in the original forum discussion from SpeedSolving.com

One thing of note is that Kinch Ranks only scores averages for most events (excluding blindfold events and FMC) with the philosophy that outlier singles are not useful for a system designed to measure overall performance.

The Senior Kinch Ranks calculations are based on official WCA results from known senior competitors (over 40).
